text: athava us vyakti ke prakaar, jo ek aisee nagaree se guzara, jo apanee chhaton sahit dhvast padee thee? usane kahaah allaah isake dhvast ho jaane ke pashchaat ise kaise jeevit (aabaad) karega? phir allaah ne use sau varsh tak maut de dee. phir use jeevit kiya aur kahaah tum kitanee avadhi tak murda pade rahe? usane kahaah ek din athava din ke kuchh kshan. (allaah ne) kahaah balki tum sau varsh tak pade rahe. apane khaane peene ko dekho ki tanik parivartan nahin hua hai tatha apane gadhe kee or dekho, taakee ham tumhen logon ke lie ek nishaanee (chinh) bana den tatha (gadhe kee) asthiyon ko dekho ki ham unhen kaise khada karate hain aur unapar kaise maans chadhaate hain? is prakaar jab usake samaksh baaten ujaagar ho gayeen, to vah[1] pukaar utha ki majhe (pratyaksh) gyaan ho gaya ki allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
